```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(foreign)
library(readstata13)

z <- read.dta13("anes_timeseries_2016_Stata13.dta")
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
## V161321a = is_img
## V161064 = vote_pref
## V161010E = State
temp <- z %>% 
  select(V161321a, V161064x, V161010e) %>% 
  filter(V161321a > 0 ) %>% 
  filter (V161064x > 0) %>% 
  mutate (pref = V161064x %% 2)
  
  
  
```
